title: Why do so many Artists follow my YouTube Channel?
description:
I've always wondered why there seemed to be so many artists that watch my channel? Garry taught and works in arts and design and shares with me what he thinks. 

Conversation notes
Jordan Peterson
Meaning Making
Graphic Symbolism
Pageau is talking about subject matter
There are a lot of artists that follow and there’s a reason for that
There’s a formal aspect for that. 
Interesting content,
All these stories are a way to get into the non-physical way of getting at meaning
We don’t know how to really get at that, to define and solidify those
Designers and artists pull meaning out of things and imbue meaning into things
When you’re building art and design there are formal elements and principles, things in the phenomenon itself, line, shape, space, color. It’s not subjective. 
In art design they are making meaning and how they do it
Red for sex, passion, romance, lust
Tweek the meaning of the color with another element
Connect that non-physical thing through the physical thing
They’ve put in more concrete terms something previously felt in an ambiguous way
Book: Ten books that screwed up the world and 5 more that didn’t help
Francis Schaeffer

Ten Books that Screwed Up the World and Five that didn't help. https://amzn.to/30cGyIw
